archimate:Device.name: Charging Ports for Mobile Devices (CPMD)
archimate:Device.documentation:
Intended Use:
Specifications:
• Charging Capacity: Supports 420 devices per charging station. • Power Output: USB-A and USB-C ports (minimum 2.4A per port, fast charging supported) • Smart Charging Features: Auto-detect power requirements per device. Overcharge, surge, and short-circuit protection to prevent battery damage. • Connectivity: Wall-mounted, desktop, or floor-standing options available. Ethernet passthrough () to allow device syncing/updates while charging. • Security Features: Lockable charging cabinet or secure docking stations to prevent device theft. RFID or PIN-based access () to restrict unauthorized device removal. • Cooling & Ventilation: Built-in cooling fans or passive ventilation to prevent overheating. • Durability: Medical-grade anti-microbial coating for infection control. Impact-resistant housing for high-use hospital environments. • Power Requirements: 220–240V AC (hospital standard).
Recommended Accessories:
• Cable management system (to prevent tangled wires). • Device tracking labels for easy identification.
Charging Ports for Mobile Documentation Stations (Computers on Wheels & Nursing Documentation Carts) Specifications:
• Charging Capacity: Supports simultaneous charging of 1–5 mobile workstations per station. • Power Output: AC power outlets (220–240V) with integrated surge protection. USB-C charging ports for peripherals. • Battery Charging Features: Hot-swappable battery support (for extended shift use). Battery health monitoring system to track usage and prevent deep discharge. • Port Configuration: Standard 3-prong hospital-grade power outlets. Integrated cable management system to reduce clutter. • Security Features: Lockable docking system to secure workstations when not in use. Tamper-resistant power outlets for safety. • Mounting Options: Wall-mounted power stations or rolling battery stations for mobile units. • Cooling & Ventilation: Integrated cooling fans or passive ventilation. • Durability: Shock-resistant casing with antimicrobial coating for infection control.
Recommended Accessories:
• Additional backup batteries (for mobile workstations). • Cable management solutions (to prevent trip hazards). • Surge protection power strips (for added security).
